subject: Relationships
subcategory: Famous Love Stories That Changed History
title: Johnny Cash and June Carter
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Johnny Cash and June Carter.

hook.text: He proposed to her on stage in front of 7,000 people. She said yes. Their love story became American legend.

buildup.text: Johnny Cash and June Carter performed together for over a decade before finally marrying in 1968.

discovery.text: June helped Johnny overcome drug addiction. Her steadfast love is credited with saving his life and career.

twist.text: Johnny died four months after June. Friends said he simply couldn't live without her. His body followed his heart.

climax.text: Their love produced iconic music and a story that proved devotion can heal the most broken person.

punchline.text: Johnny died four months after June. He couldn't live without her.

quiz.question: How did June Carter help Johnny Cash?
options: She helped him overcome drug addiction
